front.title: Extensions to RSVP-TE for LSP Ingress Local Protection

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) for locally protecting the ingress node of a Traffic Engineered (TE) Label Switched Path (LSP) in a Multi- Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) network.
